document.full_text: japanese power firm chubu electric on monday agreed to shut a nuclear plant until it can be better defended against the type of massive tsunami that in march triggered the worst atomic crisis in 25 years.
document.title: japan to shut nuclear plant on quake fears
lines_and_colors: japanese power firm chubu electric on monday agreed to shut a nuclear plant until it can be better defended against the type of massive tsunami that in march triggered the worst atomic crisis in 25 years.
